content.value: public static EquivalentException ForMismatchedTypes(Type expectedType, Type actualType, string memberName)
Public Shared Function ForMismatchedTypes(expectedType As Type, actualType As Type, memberName As String) As EquivalentException

parameters.description: The expected type
The actual type
The name of the member that was being inspected (may be an empty string for a top-level comparison)

children.summary: Creates a new instance of which shows a message that indicates that expectedType does not match actualType. This is typically only used in special case comparison where it would be known that general comparison would fail for other reasons, like two objects derived from with different concrete types.
